message: Let's split it evenly, a fair start!
You're being too generous, I'll take the majority
I'm willing to compromise, but still want a decent share
I'll take a bigger share, you can't blame me for being ambitious
I'm willing to compromise again, but I'm not giving up too much
I'm not budging, you'll have to make a better offer
I'm making a final stand, I'll take what's left
